title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 315: Featuring Jack Eichel + Shane Doan
description:
On Episode 315 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jack Eichel and Shane Doan. Jack joined (42:47) to talk about this upcoming season in Buffalo, Taylor Hall, some music, his dog and tons more. The guys then break down the East and Central Divisions followed up by a great interview with Shane Doan. Shane joined (01:39:27) to talk about his new role with the Arizona Coyotes, his kids, some hilarious pranks and a bunch more. The guys wrap up with some NHL news, the West and North Division predictions and the return of RA's gambling corner.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
